SourceString:
Th-that's a {Dolboard_Prism_Name}, ain't it! You got something amazing there, y'know! If I attached that to your dolboard, you could transform your machine's form!
Of course, you can always go back to its original form and your dolboard's performance, like it's speed and stuff, wouldn't be impacted!
Want me to try installing the {Dolboard_Prism_Name} real quick?
Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha. Finally... At last!\nThe time has come! LET'S PRISM CUSTOMIZE!!<end>
Ah, that's too bad. Not very romantic, y'know.\nWhen you do, please remember me!<br_breakr>
Welcome! This is the Dolboard Customs Shop!<br_breakr>
Alright then, with that, back to the Custom Shop.<br_breakr>

Now then! What can I do for you today?
<select>
Customize
Explain
<select_end><break>
Come back when you're ready to customize your dolboard\nagain. Until then, treat your machine like you're in\na romance!

Supposing you obtain one of these valuables called a 'prism', bring it back to me here!
Then I'll install install it on your machine real quick! Until then, treat your machine like you're in a romance!
You can change your dolboard's form in the menu,\n'Misc.' > System 'Settings' > 'Dolboard Prism', too.
Don't want to change your color yet?
Go back to the original set of colors?<yesno><break>
That's the coloring you want, right? That'll be\n{Gold_Need}G, okay?\n<yesno><break>
Oh yeah? Looks like you're lacking gold.
OK! Then let's give it some color!
...Alright! Got it prettied up! Anything else?

Oops, sorry. For now, your machine's not ready for form-changing. In order to do the form-changing, you'll need a valuable item called a 'prism'.
Supposing you obtain one of these valuables called a 'prism', bring it back to me here!
Then I'll install install it on your machine real quick!
You say you don't want to change right now? Choose\nsomething else.\n<end>
{Dolboard_Prism_Name}, that's the form-change\nyou want, right?<yesno><close>

What do you want explained?
<select>
Coloring
Form-Changing
<select_end><break>
Coloring is a service to change the color of your\nmachine's various parts! If you want to go back to\nyour original colors, there'll be a fee.<bw_break>

Form-Changing is a service to change your machine's form to one that you'd prefer!
If your dolboard doesn't have at least one valuable item called a 'prism' attached to it, then you won't be able to form-change.
Form-changing happens to be a hobby of mine, so I'll waive the fee.
